comment: Match ends, Costa Rica 1(5), Greece 1(3).
Penalty Shootout ends, Costa Rica 1(5), Greece 1(3).
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(5), Greece 1(3). Michael Umaña (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty saved! Theofanis Gekas (Greece) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(4), Greece 1(3). Joel Campbell (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(3), Greece 1(3). José Holebas (Greece) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(3), Greece 1(2). Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(2), Greece 1(2). Lazaros Christodoulopoulos (Greece) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(2), Greece 1(1). Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(1), Greece 1(1). Kostas Mitroglou (Greece) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(1), Greece 1. Celso Borges (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
Penalty Shootout begins Costa Rica 1, Greece 1.
Second Half Extra Time ends, Costa Rica 1, Greece 1.
Foul by Konstantinos Katsouranis (Greece).
Randall Brenes (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Greece. Conceded by Keylor Navas.
